chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 13 and it has the above issue:
I received my phone on May 24, 2024, just one day after ordering it on May 23. The phone was described as being in excellent condition when I ordered it, but upon receipt, I noticed noticeable wear and tear (camera and front side top) despite this. I've decided to change my mind and prefer a completely new phone instead. Despite the good service and fast shipping, I'm returning it due to changed preferences.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
